it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.environments

Class ImageEnvironment<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.environments.AbstractEnvironment<T>
      • it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.environments.AbstractLinkingRuleEnvironment<T>
        • it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.environments.Continuous2DEnvironment<T>
          • it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.environments.LimitedContinuos2D<T>
            • it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.environments.Continuous2DObstacles<T>
              • it.unibo.alchemist.model.implementations.environments.ImageEnvironment<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEnvironment<T>, IEnvironment2DWithObstacles<RectObstacle2D,T>, Serializable, Iterable<INode<T>>

    public class ImageEnvironment<T>
extends Continuous2DObstacles<T>
    This environment loads an image from the file system, and marks as obstacles all the pixels of a given color.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageEnvironment

        public ImageEnvironment(String path)
                 throws IOException
        Parameters:
        path - the path where to load the image. Must be a local file path.
        Throws:
        IOException - if image file cannot be found, or if you disconnected your hard drive while this method was running.

      • ImageEnvironment

        public ImageEnvironment(String path,
                        double zoom)
                 throws IOException
        Parameters:
        path - the path where to load the image. Must be a local file path.
        zoom - zoom level
        Throws:
        IOException - if image file cannot be found, or if you disconnected your hard drive while this method was running.

      • ImageEnvironment

        public ImageEnvironment(String path,
                        double zoom,
                        double dx,
                        double dy)
                 throws IOException
        Parameters:
        path - the path where to load the image. Must be a local file path.
        zoom - zoom level
        dx - delta X position
        dy - delta Y position
        Throws:
        IOException - if image file cannot be found, or if you disconnected your hard drive while this method was running.

      • ImageEnvironment

        public ImageEnvironment(int obs,
                        String path,
                        double zoom,
                        double dx,
                        double dy)
                 throws IOException
        Parameters:
        obs - integer representing the RGB color to use as color for the obstacle detection in image. Encoding follows common Java rules: Color.getRGB()
        path - the path where to load the image. Must be a local file path.
        zoom - zoom level
        dx - delta X position
        dy - delta Y position
        Throws:
        IOException - if image file cannot be found, or if you disconnected your hard drive while this method was running.
